video.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
video.synopsis: When Paris is in peril, Marinette becomes Ladybug. Little does she know, her school crush Adrien is actually Cat Noir, another city-saving superhero.

episodes.synopsis: Adrien's best friend, Nino, is akumatized into the Bubbler, a villain who traps adults in bubbles and sends them floating away into the atmosphere.
episodes.title: The Bubbler

episodes.synopsis: The akuma fighters try to apprehend Mr. Pigeon, a bird lover who has kidnapped all the park keepers in Paris, but Cat Noir's allergies interfere.
episodes.title: Mr. Pigeon

episodes.synopsis: After losing a contest for TV weather girl, bitter Aurore is akumatized into the villain Stormy Weather, who traps Marinette's friend Alya in ice.
episodes.title: Stormy Weather

episodes.synopsis: When anger over a broken watch turns Alix into a time-traveling villain, it's up to Ladybug to return to the past and thwart her plans.
episodes.title: Timebreaker

episodes.synopsis: A jealous sculptor in love with Ladybug akumatizes into Copycat, a duplicate of Cat Noir who tries to take his rival's place by Ladybug's side.
episodes.title: Copycat

episodes.synopsis: When a villain with the power of the ancient Egyptian gods wants to sacrifice Alya, Ladybug and Cat Noir must fight an army of mummies to rescue her.
episodes.title: The Pharaoh

episodes.synopsis: Mistakenly believing that Chloé is Ladybug, Alya gets expelled from school for her nosiness and becomes akumatized into the villain Lady Wifi.
episodes.title: Lady Wifi

episodes.synopsis: A fellow student with a crush on Marinette is akumatized into the Evillustrator, a villain that Cat Noir must face without Ladybug.
episodes.title: The Evillustrator

episodes.synopsis: When he's fired by the mayor, police officer Roger becomes Rogercop, a villain who thinks he's enforcing the law by ruling Paris as a dictator.
episodes.title: Rogercop

episodes.synopsis: Marinette considers declaring her feelings to Adrien for Valentine's Day, but first they must stop Dark Cupid, a villain bent on eradicating love.
episodes.title: Dark Cupid

episodes.synopsis: During the filming of a short horror movie for Marinette's class, scared star Mylène is akumatized into a slimy monster that feeds on others' fears.
episodes.title: Horrificator

episodes.synopsis: While Marinette tries to retrieve her diary from Chloé, Adrien's fencing teacher is akumatized into Darkblade, a villain who storms city hall.
episodes.title: Darkblade

episodes.synopsis: When Mylène's father loses a part in a play to his scheming understudy, he akumatizes into the Mime, a villain whose pantomimes become real.
episodes.title: The Mime

episodes.synopsis: Marinette can't transform into Ladybug when classmate Rose is akumatized into a villain whose perfume lets her control Cat Noir and a visiting prince.
episodes.title: Princess Fragrance

episodes.synopsis: In a flashback, Ladybug and Cat Noir's origins are revealed, as Marinette befriends Alya and meets Adrien, a famous model with an overprotective dad.
episodes.title: Ladybug & Cat Noir: Origins: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: In a continuing flashback to Ladybug and Cat Noir's origins, Marinette mistakes Adrien for a bully and hesitates to embrace her Ladybug persona.
episodes.title: Stoneheart: Origins: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: A humiliated zookeeper is akumatized into a villainous shapeshifting animal on a day when Marinette, Adrien and friends are visiting the zoo in Paris.
episodes.title: Animan

episodes.synopsis: A hypnotist akumatizes into Simon Says, a villain who can make anyone obey him with his deck of cards, and seeks revenge on Adrien's father.
episodes.title: Simon Says

episodes.synopsis: Rejected by a rock star, an angry fan becomes Pixelator, who traps Parisians in his camera's memory until Cat Noir and Ladybug halt his photo spree.
episodes.title: Pixelator

episodes.synopsis: Rock star Jagged Stone is akumatized into a supervillain who tries to transform all Parisians into fans and undermine his musical rival, Mr. XY.
episodes.title: Guitar Villain

episodes.synopsis: When his dish at a competition is sabotaged, Marinette's great-uncle chef Wang Cheng becomes Kung Food, who recruits henchmen with his cooking.
episodes.title: Kung Food

episodes.synopsis: Marinette beats Adrien's video game tournament partner, Max, so she can replace him and spend time with her crush, but Max akumatizes into a villain.
episodes.title: Gamer

episodes.synopsis: Excluded from a class photo, dejected Juleka akumatizes into the villain Reflekta, who turns everyone, including Cat Noir, into copies of herself.
episodes.title: Reflekta

episodes.synopsis: Marinette babysits little Manon, who becomes akumatized into the Puppeteer while playing with dolls of Ladybug, Cat Noir and some infamous villains.
episodes.title: The Puppeteer

episodes.synopsis: Crestfallen when her hero Ladybug refuses to heed her advice, Chloé akumatizes into Antibug, an evil twin of Ladybug with identical powers.
episodes.title: Antibug

episodes.synopsis: Humiliated in front of Adrien by Marinette, Lila -- a rival who pretends to be Ladybug's friend -- akumatizes into Volpina, a villain of illusions.
episodes.title: Volpina

episodes.synopsis: Master Fu and Marinette believe that the owner of the Miraculous book is Hawk Moth, but that suspicion leads to either Adrien or his father, Gabriel.
episodes.title: The Collector

episodes.synopsis: During an exclusive interview, a reporter trying to trap Ladybug and Cat Noir into confessing feelings for each other is akumatized by Hawk Moth.
episodes.title: Prime Queen

episodes.synopsis: Trying to learn how to be nice, Chloé throws a party but loses her temper and fires her butler, who becomes akumatized into the vengeful Despair Bear.
episodes.title: Despair Bear

episodes.synopsis: A fencing opponent who loses a duel against Adrien gets akumatized and goes after him for a rematch while only Ladybug is around to protect him.
episodes.title: Riposte

episodes.synopsis: When Marinette elects to hang out with her friends on her birthday instead of her grandmother, grandma is akumatized into a candy-gun-wielding baddie.
episodes.title: Befana

episodes.synopsis: Hawk Moth akumatizes Max's best friend and pet robot, Markov, into Robostus, a raging techno-threat with the power to bring inanimate objects to life.
episodes.title: Robostus

episodes.synopsis: After school principal Damocles is akumatized into Dark Owl, he traps Ladybug and Cat Noir in a warehouse and tries to uncover their true identities.
episodes.title: The Dark Owl

episodes.synopsis: Marinette's plans to ask Adrien out on a romantic walk are foiled when Hawk Moth akumatizes a frustrated child into a giant, lollipop-seeking baby.
episodes.title: Gigantitan

episodes.synopsis: Marinette meets Alya and friends for a treat at André's, a legendary Parisian ice cream maker, but André is akumatized into the villain Glaciator.
episodes.title: Glaciator

episodes.synopsis: During a sleepover with Marinette, Alya punishes her twin sisters, Etta and Ella, who get akumatized into monsters that multiply when they eat.
episodes.title: The Sapotis

episodes.synopsis: Marinette must rescue Adrien from a group of overzealous fans and from his own bodyguard, who has been akumatized into the hulking Gorizilla.
episodes.title: The Gorilla

episodes.synopsis: Hawk Moth akumatizes Juleka's mother into Captain Hardrock, a pirate whose indestructible ship blasts loud music to destroy a music festival.
episodes.title: Captain Hardrock

episodes.synopsis: Marinette is cast to play Ladybug and Adrien as Cat Noir for a music video honoring the heroes, but the star gets akumatized into a musical monster.
episodes.title: Frightningale

episodes.synopsis: When her crush, Kim, goes on a movie date with someone else, talented swimmer Ondine gets akumatized into Syren, who tries to submerge Paris.
episodes.title: Syren

episodes.synopsis: The students give gifts to Miss Bustier on her birthday but the popular teacher is akumatized into Zombizou, a monster armed with evil black lipstick.
episodes.title: Zombizou

episodes.synopsis: A figure skater gets akumatized by Hawk Moth into Frozer, a villain armed with powerful skates who tries to turn Paris into a frozen wasteland.
episodes.title: Frozer

episodes.synopsis: When she is humiliated by Gabriel, Chloe's mother becomes Style Queen, who possesses a magical scepter and aims to exact her revenge on Adrien.
episodes.title: Style Queen: The Queen's Battle: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: A rock star is scheduled to visit the bakery owned by Marinette's parents, but his overwhelmed personal assistant is akumatized by Hawk Moth.
episodes.title: Troublemaker

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to impress her mother, Chloe tries to become the superhero Queen Bee but is instead transformed into the supervillain Queen Wasp.
episodes.title: Queen Wasp: The Queen's Battle: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Angry over his perception that Marinette and Nathaniel humiliated him, fellow student Marc becomes Reverser, who is determined to get revenge.
episodes.title: Reverser

episodes.synopsis: Alya's older sister Nora becomes akumatized by Hawk Moth into Anansi, an enormous spider-woman hybrid named after an African folktale.
episodes.title: Anansi

episodes.synopsis: When Chloe considers leaving Paris, her father, Mayor Bourgeois, turns into Malediktator, a powerful villain who wants her to stay at any cost.
episodes.title: Malediktator

episodes.synopsis: The supervillain Sandboy uses his powers to turn the nightmares of Parisians into reality, forcing a Tikki-less Marinette to intervene.
episodes.title: Sandboy

episodes.synopsis: Marinette lies about preparing a good deed to perform for others on the Day of Heroes and quickly finds her untruth spinning out of control.
episodes.title: Catalyst: Heroes' Day: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Ladybug and Cat Noir face one of their most fearsome opponents when Hawk Moth sets a sinister plan into motion by akumatizing his assistant.
episodes.title: Mayura: Heroes' Day: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Marinette and Adrien confront Lila with her lies, so she asks Hawk Moth to akumatize her into Chameleon, a new villain determined to destroy Ladybug.
episodes.title: Chameleon

episodes.synopsis: Humiliated at the premiere of his new Ladybug and Cat Noir movie, the director becomes Animaestro, forcing the real superheroes to act fast.
episodes.title: Animaestro

episodes.synopsis: Marinette meets her grumpy grandpa for the first time, leading him to akumatize into a villain who wants to destroy everything modern in Paris.
episodes.title: Bakerix

episodes.synopsis: After Marinette mixes up some messages, an old love of Master Fu becomes Backwarder, who wields a magic wand that can steal time from others.
episodes.title: Backwarder

episodes.synopsis: When he can't find anyone to test his video game that pits formerly akumatized villains against one another, Max again becomes one himself: Gamer 2.0.
episodes.title: Gamer 2.0

episodes.synopsis: Disappointed that Cat Noir doesn't return his daughter's love, Tom becomes Weredad, who locks Marinette in a magic prison to protect her from hurt.
episodes.title: Weredad

episodes.synopsis: Marinette and Kitty Section record a music video, but an unscrupulous producer, the father of XY, steals their ideas and inspires Luka to seek revenge.
episodes.title: Silencer

episodes.synopsis: Kagami becomes jealous when Lila manipulates her way into the Agreste mansion and turns into Oni-Chan, a masked villain who can teleport.
episodes.title: Oni-Chan

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina, angry at Chloe for the attention she gives to Ladybug, becomes Miraculer, who can steal powers away from superheroes.
episodes.title: Miraculer

episodes.synopsis: When they enter the Montparnasse Tower, Ladybug and Cat Noir lose their memories and transform back into Marinette and Adrien in front of each other.
episodes.title: Oblivio

episodes.synopsis: After Adrien tells his friend Wayem he's not allowed to have friends over, Wayem discovers an impromptu party at the Agrestes that makes him jealous.
episodes.title: Party Crasher

episodes.synopsis: Marinette babysits Nino's little brother, Chris, who akumatizes into Chris Master and wields a magic snow globe that can make giant toys.
episodes.title: Chris Master

episodes.synopsis: Marinette tries to arrange some alone time with Adrien at the wax museum, but she's supposed to be babysitting Manon, who becomes Puppeteer again.
episodes.title: The Puppeteer 2

episodes.synopsis: Ladybug and Cat Noir must fight Aurore Boreale when she is akumatized again into Stormy Weather 2, who wants to plunge the world into endless winter.
episodes.title: Stormy Weather 2

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Mendeleiev discovers Plagg and Tikki and plans to reveal the existence of the kwamis on a TV show until she is akumatized into Kwami Buster.
episodes.title: Kwamibuster

episodes.synopsis: A strange statue uncovered in Tibet turns out to be a sentimonster called Feast that was created accidentally by Master Fu when he was a child.
episodes.title: Feast

episodes.synopsis: Ladybug and Cat Noir each get the other's Miraculous when they must take on Juleka, who has become Reflekta again and now has a sentimonster.
episodes.title: Reflekdoll

episodes.synopsis: Adrien is the prize in a Paris-wide Friendship Day treasure hunt, but Marinette is teamed up with Kagami, who has disobeyed her mother to participate.
episodes.title: Ikari Gozen

episodes.synopsis: Jagged Stone seeks to replace the guitarist he fired, who akumatizes into Desperada, a villain with a magic guitar that turns people into stickers.
episodes.title: Desperada

episodes.synopsis: Anxiously awaiting news about her astronaut application, Max's mom becomes Startrain, who wants to turn her train into a rocket ship.
episodes.title: Startrain

episodes.synopsis: Ladybug and Cat Noir are trapped between two time travelers from the future, one of whom has been sent by Hawk Moth to steal their Miraculous.
episodes.title: Timetagger

episodes.synopsis: Marinette uses her powers to leave a gift for Adrien, causing him to realize her secret identity -- which has a devastating impact on the future.
episodes.title: Cat Blanc

episodes.synopsis: Marinette reveals her feelings for Adrien on the anniversary of his mom's death, but his lookalike cousin pretends to be Adrien and responds cruelly.
episodes.title: Felix

episodes.synopsis: Marinette's scheming nemesis Lila manipulates all of her friends into turning against her and even gets Marinette expelled from school.
episodes.title: Ladybug

episodes.synopsis: At a celebration for their twentieth anniversary, the Bourgeois couple is akumatized into Hearthunter, a two-headed Cerberus that devours love.
episodes.title: Heart Hunter

episodes.synopsis: Hawk Moth changes Chloe into Miracle Queen and conquers Paris, forcing Miraculous wearers to reveal themselves -- but Ladybug and Cat Noir escape.
episodes.title: Miracle Queen
